trans-unit.source: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.-3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.-8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

trans-unit.target: 由于曾横扫多明纳里亚的时间灾祸，时间错置的生物依旧每年都会出现。

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Claustrophobia
trans-unit.target: 幽闭恐怖症

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物当幽闭恐怖症进战场时，横置所结附的生物。所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.
trans-unit.target: 六呎泥土掩盖了他的惨嚎。

trans-unit.source: Clone
trans-unit.target: 仿生妖

trans-unit.source: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使仿生妖当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.source: He knows your strengths, your weaknesses, and the shape of that unfortunate birthmark on your backside.
trans-unit.target: 他知道你的长处、弱点、以及你背上厄运胎记的形状。

trans-unit.source: Colossal Whale
trans-unit.target: 超巨鲸

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者（只要防御牌手操控海岛，此生物就不能被阻挡。）每当超巨鲸攻击时，你可以放逐目标由防御牌手操控的生物，直到超巨鲸离开战场为止。（该生物会在其拥有者的操控下移回。）

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚人鱼

trans-unit.source: Early sailors thought they were tricks of the mind or perhaps manatees. As more and more ships were classified as lost to "manatee attacks," the truth began to dawn.
trans-unit.target: 早期的水手认为他们是心理错觉，或只当成是海牛。随着愈来愈多船被列为因「海牛攻击」而失踪，真相开始大白。

trans-unit.resname: M14·50 | Dismiss into Dream | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dismiss into Dream
trans-unit.target: 散落入梦

trans-unit.resname: M14·50 | Dismiss into Dream | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的每个生物均额外具有「虚影」此类别，且都具有「当此生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。」

trans-unit.resname: M14·50 | Dismiss into Dream | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You trust in the shadows of a breeze."\n—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「你该相信微风也有影子。」～塔晋息法师诺言达

trans-unit.source: Disperse
trans-unit.target: 驱散

trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Gryffid found his way home and resumed life as best he could, constantly hiding his newfound fear of clouds.
trans-unit.target: 格瑞菲找到回家的路并尽力回复正常生活，努力不表现出现今对云的恐惧。

trans-unit.source: Divination
trans-unit.target: 卜卦

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."\n—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle
trans-unit.target: 「解开谜题的关键就在你心中。」～西北风屿导师多瑞尔

trans-unit.source: Domestication
trans-unit.target: 驯化

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物你操控所结附的生物。在你的结束步骤开始时，若所结附的生物之力量为4或更多，则牺牲驯化。

trans-unit.source: Elite Arcanist
trans-unit.target: 精英奥术师

trans-unit.source: When Elite Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand.{X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the converted mana cost of the exiled card.
trans-unit.target: 当精英奥术师进战场时，你可以从你手上放逐一张瞬间牌。{X}，{T}：复制所放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。X为所放逐的牌之总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Essence Scatter
trans-unit.target: 菁华离散

trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「我可将你力图从乙太那里收集的东西散至风中。」～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Frost Breath
trans-unit.target: 霜息

trans-unit.source: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 横置至多两个目标生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."
trans-unit.target: 「我要把你的骨头冻成冰当钟敲。」

trans-unit.source: Galerider Sliver
trans-unit.target: 御风裂片妖

trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Masters of adaptation, galeriders serve multiple purposes useful to the hive. When they're not patrolling their territories, their majestic wings serve to circulate cool air through the vast hive chambers.
trans-unit.target: 御风裂片妖适应力极强，对巢穴有着多重功能。他们不是出外巡查领土，就是拿雄伟的翅膀替巨大巢穴通风。

trans-unit.resname: M14·58 | Glimpse the Future | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glimpse the Future
trans-unit.target: 瞥视未来

trans-unit.resname: M14·58 | Glimpse the Future | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: M14·58 | Glimpse the Future | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No simple coin toss can solve this riddle. You must think and choose wisely."\n—Shai Fusan, archmage
trans-unit.target: 「你没办法抛硬币来解决这谜题。你必须仔细思考并明智选择。」～大法师赛福桑

trans-unit.source: Illusionary Armor
trans-unit.target: 幻象铠甲

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Illusionary Armor.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得+4/+4。当所结附的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，牺牲幻象铠甲。

trans-unit.resname: M14·60 | Jace, Memory Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Memory Adept
trans-unit.target: 记忆专家杰斯

trans-unit.resname: M14·60 | Jace, Memory Adept | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.-7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.
trans-unit.target: +1：抓一张牌。目标牌手将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。0：目标牌手将其牌库顶的十张牌置入其坟墓场。-7：任意数量的目标牌手各抓二十张牌。

trans-unit.source: Jace's Mindseeker
trans-unit.target: 杰斯的觅灵影

trans-unit.target: 飞行当杰斯的觅灵影进战场时，目标对手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。你可以施放其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Spy
trans-unit.target: 人鱼间谍

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者（只要防御牌手操控海岛，此生物就不能被阻挡。）每当人鱼间谍对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其手上随机展示一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Messenger Drake
trans-unit.target: 信使龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying When Messenger Drake dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当信使龙兽死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The more important the message, the larger the messenger.
trans-unit.target: 信息越重要，信使越庞大。

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.
trans-unit.target: 秘术大师很欣赏此等绝妙吊诡：他们深沉又复杂的秘法会导出简单至极的结果～只需说出是或否两字的能力。

trans-unit.source: Nephalia Seakite
trans-unit.target: 涅非利亚海鸢

trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）飞行

trans-unit.source: "Keep one eye on the cliff road or you may fall to your death. Keep one eye on the sky or your death may fall on you."\n—Manfried Ulmach, Elgaud Master-at-Arms
trans-unit.target: 「用一眼留心悬崖道路，以防坠崖而亡。另一眼则要留心天空，以防死亡突降。」～艾尔告兵器专家曼费乌玛

trans-unit.source: Opportunity
trans-unit.target: 机遇

trans-unit.source: Target player draws four cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓四张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."
trans-unit.target: 「机遇不是等来的，而是创造出来的。」

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「防御工事不只是砌砌砖就算了结的。」～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Quicken
trans-unit.target: 加快

trans-unit.source: The next sorcery card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.) Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 你于本回合中下一次施放的法术牌能视同具有闪现异能地来施放。（该牌可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放。）抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.
trans-unit.target: 技艺纯熟的伊捷时法师，能在沙漏两粒沙落下的时间差里完成一回壮绝复仇。

trans-unit.source: Scroll Thief
trans-unit.target: 卷轴盗贼

trans-unit.source: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当卷轴盗贼对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 凯普萧人鱼不懈地追寻神秘知识，甚至已渗透进遥远的苏拿里沙漠城堡要塞中。

trans-unit.source: Seacoast Drake
trans-unit.target: 海滨龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Seacoast drakes have been known to follow ships for hundreds of miles, waiting to snap up garbage, bait, and the occasional sailor.
trans-unit.target: 已知海滨龙兽会跟随船舶数百浬，伺机攫取垃圾，鱼饵，偶尔还有水手。

trans-unit.source: Sensory Deprivation

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得-3/-0。

trans-unit.source: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.
trans-unit.target: 他们称这咒语为「拼接师的麻醉」，用来在这些疯狂医师开始其恶心工作前切断情绪。

trans-unit.source: Spell Blast
trans-unit.target: 魔力障壁

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标总法术力费用为X的咒语。（举例来说，如果该咒语的法术力费用为{3}{U}{U}，则X为5。）

trans-unit.source: "Perhaps you could try throwing a rock? That might be better suited to your intellect."
trans-unit.target: 「也许你可以试着扔石头？那可能和你的智力更相称。」

trans-unit.source: Tidebinder Mage
trans-unit.target: 潮缚法师

trans-unit.source: When Tidebinder Mage enters the battlefield, tap target red or green creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Tidebinder Mage.
trans-unit.target: 当潮缚法师进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的红色或绿色生物。只要你操控潮缚法师，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中便不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Time Ebb
trans-unit.target: 时光退潮

trans-unit.source: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "Yesterday you were just a figment of your master's imagination. I liked you better then."\n—Shai Fusan, archmage
trans-unit.target: 「昨天，你只是你主人幻想之中的角色。我比较喜欢那时的你。」～大法师赛福桑

trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "I hope none of those were important!"

trans-unit.source: Trained Condor
trans-unit.target: 驯使兀鹰

trans-unit.target: 飞行每当驯使兀鹰攻击时，另一个目标由你操控的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "They're smart enough to understand that war means lots of carrion."\n—Griv, condor rider
trans-unit.target: 「它们很聪明，足以明白战争意味着大量腐肉。」～兀鹰骑兵格里夫

trans-unit.source: Traumatize

trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库从顶上算起一半数量的牌置入其坟墓场，小数点以下舍去。

trans-unit.source: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.
trans-unit.target: 他仅剩的回忆，只刚好够了解他已失去的部分。

trans-unit.resname: M14·78 | Wall of Frost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Frost
trans-unit.target: 霜墙

trans-unit.resname: M14·78 | Wall of Frost | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）每当霜墙阻挡一个生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: M14·78 | Wall of Frost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen countless petty warmongers gaze on it for a time before turning away."\n—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge
trans-unit.target: 「我见过数不清的可鄙好战者盯着它一段时间才转身离去。」～北境神圣武士莎雷娜

trans-unit.target: 飞行由你施放且具飞行异能的生物咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: M14·79 | Warden of Evos Isle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.
trans-unit.target: 在伊弗斯岛上，迅捷且强大的艾文负责执行史芬斯统治者之意愿。

trans-unit.source: Water Servant
trans-unit.target: 水仆役

trans-unit.source: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn.{U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {U}：水仆役得+1/-1直到回合结束。{U}：水仆役得-1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides."\n—Jestus Dreya, *Of Elements and Eternity*
trans-unit.target: 「这生物天生有着觉察力。他知道何时该从浪潮中现身，何时该隐身其间。」～杰特坠亚，《元素与永恒》

trans-unit.source: Windreader Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 风信史芬斯

trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行每当一个具飞行异能的生物攻击时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."
trans-unit.target: 「你的脑袋塞满了愚蠢的担忧，以致无法听到微风带来的细微低语。」

trans-unit.source: Zephyr Charge
trans-unit.target: 西风冲锋

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "All armies prefer high ground to low and sunny places to dark."\n—Sun Tzu, *Art of War*, trans. Giles
trans-unit.target: 「凡军好高而恶下，贵阳而贱阴。」～《孙子兵法》

trans-unit.source: Accursed Spirit

trans-unit.source: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
trans-unit.target: 威吓（此生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都听过铠甲拖行和嘎吱轻响的声音，唯有其受害者才会迎上那冰冷的凝视。

trans-unit.source: Altar's Reap
trans-unit.target: 祭坛夺命

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放祭坛夺命的额外费用。抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."\n—Gorghul, augur of skulls
trans-unit.target: 「别担心，我们会尽力从你的死亡取得大量情报。」～颅骨卜算师苟古

trans-unit.source: "Some treasures aren't worth finding, let alone stealing."\n—Dack Fayden
trans-unit.target: 「有些宝藏不值得寻找，更遑论窃取。」～戴克费登

trans-unit.source: "Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."
trans-unit.target: 「你的肉身还没准备好接受我的赠礼。」

trans-unit.source: Blood Bairn
trans-unit.target: 鲜血童子

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲另一个生物：鲜血童子得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.
trans-unit.target: 旅客警示：留意路上的小孩。

trans-unit.source: Bogbrew Witch

trans-unit.resname: M14·209 | Elixir of Immortality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elixir of Immortality
trans-unit.target: 永生琼浆

trans-unit.resname: M14·209 | Elixir of Immortality | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：你获得5点生命。将永生琼浆与你的坟墓场洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: M14·209 | Elixir of Immortality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."\n—Baron Sengir
trans-unit.target: 「瓶装的生命。风味不太如我意，也不新鲜，但起码功效相同。」～辛格男爵

trans-unit.source: Fireshrieker
trans-unit.target: 鸣火杖

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有连击异能。（它能造成先攻与普通战斗伤害。）佩带{2}（{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: M14·211 | Guardian of the Ages | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guardian of the Ages
trans-unit.target: 远古守护者

trans-unit.resname: M14·211 | Guardian of the Ages | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, if Guardian of the Ages has defender, it loses defender and gains trample.
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）当一个生物攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客时，若远古守护者具有守军异能，则它失去守军异能并获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: M14·211 | Guardian of the Ages | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "At my feet, invasions end."\n—Statue inscription
trans-unit.target: 「入侵在我的脚下终结。」～雕像铭文

trans-unit.resname: M14·212 | Haunted Plate Mail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haunted Plate Mail
trans-unit.target: 遭祟板甲

trans-unit.resname: M14·212 | Haunted Plate Mail | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +4/+4.{0}: Until end of turn, Haunted Plate Mail becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature that's no longer an Equipment. Activate this ability only if you control no creatures. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+4/+4。{0}：直到回合结束，遭祟板甲成为4/4精怪神器生物，且不再是武具。你只可以于你未操控生物时起动此异能。佩带{4}（{4}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.
trans-unit.target: 头脑就像山脉一般，无论多么雄伟宏大，都依旧可以化为尘埃。

trans-unit.source: Pyromancer's Gauntlet
trans-unit.target: 烈焰术士护手

trans-unit.source: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控的红色瞬间或法术咒语、或由你操控的红色鹏洛客将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成原数量加2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: An inferno is just a gesture away.
trans-unit.target: 只需挥手就可引发地狱之火。

trans-unit.source: Ratchet Bomb
trans-unit.target: 棘齿炸弹

trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb.{T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.
trans-unit.target: {T}：在棘齿炸弹上放置一个充电指示物。{T}，牺牲棘齿炸弹：消灭所有总法术力费用等同于棘齿炸弹上充电指示物数量的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: M14·216 | Ring of Three Wishes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ring of Three Wishes
trans-unit.target: 三愿戒指

trans-unit.resname: M14·216 | Ring of Three Wishes | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ring of Three Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.{5}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Ring of Three Wishes: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 三愿戒指进战场时上面有三个祈愿指示物。{5}，{T}，从三愿戒指上移去一个祈愿指示物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: M14·217 | Rod of Ruin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rod of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 遗迹棍棒

trans-unit.resname: M14·217 | Rod of Ruin | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：遗迹棍棒对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: M14·217 | Rod of Ruin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The good news is it's so simple a goblin could use it. The bad news is it's so simple a goblin could use it.
trans-unit.target: 好消息是它简单到鬼怪都会用。坏消息是它简单到鬼怪都会用。

trans-unit.source: Sliver Construct
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖组构体

trans-unit.source: Slivers destroy those who come close to the Skep, the central hive. Shards of torn metal litter the ground as a warning to any artificers inquisitive about the hive's inner workings.
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖会杀害胆敢靠近中央巢穴者。金属碎片散落满地，用以警告所有想探究巢穴内部运作的神器师。

trans-unit.resname: M14·219 | Staff of the Death Magus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Staff of the Death Magus
trans-unit.target: 死亡法师杖

trans-unit.resname: M14·219 | Staff of the Death Magus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放黑色咒语或每当一个沼泽在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M14·219 | Staff of the Death Magus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A symbol of ambition in ruthless times.
trans-unit.target: 在无情的时代中象征着野心。

trans-unit.resname: M14·220 | Staff of the Flame Magus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Staff of the Flame Magus
trans-unit.target: 火焰法师杖

trans-unit.resname: M14·220 | Staff of the Flame Magus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放红色咒语或每当一个山脉在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M14·220 | Staff of the Flame Magus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A symbol of passion in indifferent times.
trans-unit.target: 在冷漠的时代中象征着热诚。

trans-unit.resname: M14·221 | Staff of the Mind Magus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Staff of the Mind Magus
trans-unit.target: 心灵法师杖

trans-unit.resname: M14·221 | Staff of the Mind Magus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a blue spell or an Island enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放蓝色咒语或每当一个海岛在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M14·221 | Staff of the Mind Magus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A symbol of sagacity in bewildering times.
trans-unit.target: 在迷惑的时代中象征着睿智。

trans-unit.resname: M14·222 | Staff of the Sun Magus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Staff of the Sun Magus
trans-unit.target: 太阳法师杖

trans-unit.resname: M14·222 | Staff of the Sun Magus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a white spell or a Plains enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放白色咒语或每当一个平原在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M14·222 | Staff of the Sun Magus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A symbol of conviction in uncertain times.
trans-unit.target: 在无常的时代中象征着信念。

trans-unit.resname: M14·223 | Staff of the Wild Magus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Staff of the Wild Magus
trans-unit.target: 原野法师杖

trans-unit.resname: M14·223 | Staff of the Wild Magus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放绿色咒语或每当一个树林在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M14·223 | Staff of the Wild Magus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.
trans-unit.target: 在压迫的时代中象征着凶猛。

trans-unit.source: Strionic Resonator
trans-unit.target: 基尼共振器

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：复制目标由你操控的触发式异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（触发式异能会以「当～」、「每当～」，或「在～时」开头。）

trans-unit.source: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.
trans-unit.target: 光靠物理力量无法使它的叉臂发声。只有强力法术能引发它怪异的共振。

trans-unit.source: Trading Post
trans-unit.target: 交易站

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a 0/1 white Goat creature token onto the battlefield.{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，弃一张牌：你获得4点生命。{1}，{T}，支付1点生命：将一个0/1白色山羊衍生生物放进战场。{1}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。{1}，{T}，牺牲一个神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: M14·226 | Vial of Poison | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vial of Poison
trans-unit.target: 毒药瓶

trans-unit.resname: M14·226 | Vial of Poison | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice Vial of Poison: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲毒药瓶：目标生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）

trans-unit.resname: M14·226 | Vial of Poison | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There are worse ways to die, but not many.
trans-unit.target: 还有更糟的死亡方式，但不是很多。

trans-unit.source: Encroaching Wastes
trans-unit.target: 侵蚀荒野

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{4}，{T}：牺牲侵蚀荒野：消灭目标非基本地。

trans-unit.source: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.
trans-unit.target: 每个世界都是一项正在进行的工程，不断地被时间、灾害，甚至是鹏洛客的强大法术重塑。

trans-unit.source: Mutavault
trans-unit.target: 易形地窖

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{1}：直到回合结束，易形地窖成为2/2生物并具有所有生物类别。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.source: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.
trans-unit.target: 有些世界具有隐藏的核心，在该处生命的本质不断地奔腾。

trans-unit.source: Shimmering Grotto
trans-unit.target: 闪烁石室

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的财富等待着抛弃繁华世界，寻找僻静之处的人。
